workflow.name: Metabarcoding OTU Clustering - Illumina PE
workflow.workflow-desc: OTU clustering pipeline for Illumina metabarcoding paired-end reads

workflow.name: Metabarcoding Denoising - Illumina PE
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for denoising of Illumina metabarcoding paired-end reads.

workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for denoising of PacBio CCS reads.

workflow.name: Shotgun Metagenomics - Eukaryotes
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for QC, assembly, and binning of the eukaryotic fraction of a shotgun metagenomic data.

workflow.name: Genomics - Prokaryotes
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for QC, assembly, and annotation of prokaryotic genomic data.

workflow.name: PICRUSt2
workflow.workflow-desc: Pipeline for prediction of community functional profile from 16S sequence data.
